Dislike: Intolerance, Discrimination and general Fuckwittery. Be nice or begone

I'm a silly fucker.

Music, nonsense, random stories (always a story) and whatever comes to mind.

Not a racist, a homophobe, a transphobe or a bigot. Basically not a cunt (I do swear so if that is not for you, I'm definitely not for you)

Please add #AltText i.e.descriptive descriptions, to your pictures for visually impaired and all people. No decent description, no boost from me

name: Profile picture
value: A Polaroid photo of me, a small bird, whispering into the ear of a once devestatingly handsome man who made bad hair choices, about 25 years ago. Being a Blue Tit, I'm probably dead now. I may have been dead at the time.

name: Header
value: Black and white photo of a now destroyed piece of emulsion slogan graffiti on a wall in Kings Cross (London, UK). It reads "Rave is Best". I'm sure there's a story behind it but the criminal responsible has never been identified.

name: Pronouns
value: He/Him/That Idiot/Dad, why are you like this?

name: Header
value: Black and white photo of a long brick wall alongside a road. On the wall is daubed in 2 foot high letters, in white emulsion paint, "Rave is Best". I'll tell you the story if you ask.

name: Avatar
value: 25 year old Polaroid photo of me, a small bird, perched on the hand  and whispering in the ear of an extremely handsome young man who made bad choices about facial and head hair, amongst many other things.
